My New Friend In Japan, Please Visit His Website
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2002 Topics ( Year Of The Password): My New Friend In Japan, Please Visit His Website
By Lisa Shock on Saturday, January 26, 2002 - 12:03 pm:

Recently, I emailed a webmaster of a Japanese site (I try this every once in a while, but so far no had replied) and he replied to me! I have added his site to our Links section.

Here is a copy of the email he sent me. (No laughing! If you tried to write in Japanese, how much better could you do?)

It is yosuke.
How do you do, Mr. Lisa Shock.
Your homepage was seen.
Ｉｔ　ｉｓ　ｖｅｒｙ　ｂｅａｕｔｉｆｕｌ．
Please give me a link also from me.
Let's enjoy MR to each other from now on.

Although there is also wrong English, it is glad if you can understand.

Thank you.！！　Good-bye！

My Homepage：http://www.page.sannet.ne.jp/k_minami/mf/index3.html

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, January 26, 2002 - 03:26 pm:

Try running it through the Babelfish translator.

By Anonymous on Saturday, January 26, 2002 - 06:47 pm:

Where can i get the Babelfish translator Lisa?

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, January 26, 2002 - 07:15 pm:

You don't get it really, it's an online service. Just go to altavista.com and type babelfish into the search and the translator will be the first thing you see. Then put the site URl in the box, and select Japanese to English
